jd: Hi cloud 098, You have a new mention from the Recruiters Community workspace (https://talent-recruiters.slack.com/x-p7639880653120-7871217163315-7882430897414/team). --- #unnanu-jobs View in the archives: https://talent-recruiters.slack.com/x-p7639880653120-7871217163315-7882430897414/archives/C07HQFSFSPR/p1728936900192309 Hemanth (3:15 PM, October 14th) *@channel* Please respond if you have best candidate for this role Job Title: *Senior Database Administrator[Remote Position]* Location: *Austin, TX, USA* Due Date : *Due Date : 20-Oct-2024* Apply using the link: https://jobs.unnanu.com/job/4193/senior-database-administrator-at-integrateus-llc *Job Description:* Responsible for entering codes to create and monitor production databases, optimizing performance, and making adjustments as needed. Works with programmers and analysts to implement database changes and resolve issues. Assists with planning, development, and maintenance of integrated databases, ensuring data integrity and efficient performance tuning. Performs data modeling, designs relational databases, and handles security, recovery, and storage strategies. Monitors database performance, implements improvements, and ensures compliance with accessibility standards.
